item.description: Join us for a lovely walk.  See the old gate locks that were used to raise and lower water level.  This is a lovely area and a great place enjoy on a Sunday morning.  Afterward, we’ll go nearby for a delightful lunch.  No charge for walk.  For info, call Gail 860-582-8229.  Directions:  Rt. 84W Exit 29 (left exit, Rt. 10 Milldale), end of ramp turn right onto Rt. 10S, go 5.5 miles (thru Cheshire center), turn right at Cornwall Avenue, go 3/4 miles to 2nd stop sign, go straight, parking on left near path.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the parking lot waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Walk & Lunch
